UTF.detail: Byte of a Unicode string of unknown format

RGBACode.detail: Enumerated value specifying component in an RGBALayoutItem

ChannelStatusMode_None.detail: No channel status data is encoded

ChannelStatusMode_Fixed.detail: Fixed 24 byes of data in FixedChannelStatusData property

ChannelStatusMode_Stream.detail: Stream of data within MXF Header Metadata

ChannelStatusMode_Essence.detail: Stream of data multiplexed within MXF Body

Stream.detail: Data mapped to AAF Stream, MXF represents using a SID

DataValue.detail: Data represented as AAF varying array of UInt8

AUID.detail: AUID is a Label or a swapped UUID

RGBALayout.detail: Specifies the type, order and size of the components within the pixel

MajorVersion.detail: Major Version number of MXF byte-level format (non-backwards compatible version number)

MinorVersion.detail: Minor Version number of MXF byte-level format (backwards compatible version number)

KAGSize.detail: Size of the KLV Alignment Grid (KAG) for this partition, in bytes

ThisPartition.detail: Byte offset of the start of This Partition, relative to the start of the Header Partition

PreviousPartition.detail: Byte offset of the start of the Previous Partition, relative to the start of the Header Partition

FooterPartition.detail: Byte offset of the start of the Footer Partition, relative to the start of the Header Partition

HeaderByteCount.detail: Count of Bytes used for Header Metadata. This starts at the byte following the Partition pack and includes any trailing filler which is part of the Header Metadata.

IndexByteCount.detail: Count of Bytes used for Index Table Segments. This starts at the byte following the Header Metadata and includes any trailing filler which is part of the Index Table.

IndexSID.detail: Index Table Segment Identifier in this partition. The value 0 defines that there are no Index Table segments in this partition.

BodyOffset.detail: Byte offset of the first byte in the following Essence Container data relative to the start of the Essence Container identified by this BodySID

BodySID.detail: Identifier of the Essence Container data found in this partition. The value 0 indicates there is no Essence Container data in this partition.

OperationalPattern.detail: Universal Label of the Operational Pattern to which this file complies

EssenceContainers.detail: The unordered batch of Universal Labels of Essence Containers used in or referenced by this file

LocalTag.detail: The value of the Local Tag

UID.detail: The UID of which the local tag is an alias

GenerationInterchangeObject.key: 80 63 c1 08 fe 0d eb 7e 3a 9d c8 e1 a8 83 b6 4b

IndexEditRate.detail: Edit Rate copied from the tracks of the Essence Container

IndexStartPosition.detail: The first editable unit indexed by this Index Table segment measured in File Package Edit Units

IndexDuration.detail: Time duration of this table segment measured in Edit Unitsof the referenceg package

EditUnitByteCount.detail: Byte count of each and every Edit Unit. A value of 0 defines the byte count of Edit Units is only given in the Index Entry Array

BodySID.detail: Stream Identifier (SID) of Essence Container Stream

V10IndexTableSegment.detail: A segment of an Index Table (v10)

ElementDelta.detail: Delta from start of slice to this Element

V10IndexEntryArray.detail: Index from Edit Unit number to stream offset

TemporalOffset.detail: Offset in edit units from Display Order to Coded Order

AnchorOffset.detail: Offset in edit units to previous Anchor Frame. The value is zero if this is an anchor frame.

StreamOffset.detail: Offset in bytes from the first KLV element in this Edit Unit within the Essence Container

SliceOffsetArray.detail: Array of offsets in bytes from the Stream Offset to the start of each slice.

SliceOffset.detail: The offset in bytes from the Stream Offset to the start of this slice.

IndexTableSegment.detail: A segment of an Index Table

PosTableIndex.detail: Index into PosTable (or Apply Temporta Reordering if -1)

ElementDelta.detail: Delta from start of slice to this Element

IndexEntryArray.detail: Index from Edit Unit number to stream offset

TemporalOffset.detail: Offset in edit units from Display Order to Coded Order

AnchorOffset.detail: Offset in edit units to previous Anchor Frame. The value is zero if this is an anchor frame.

StreamOffset.detail: Offset in bytes from the first KLV element in this Edit Unit within the Essence Container

SliceOffsetArray.detail: Array of offsets in bytes from the Stream Offset to the start of each slice.

SliceOffset.detail: The offset in bytes from the Stream Offset to the start of this slice.

PosTableArray.detail: Array of fractional position offsets from the start of the content package to the synchronized sample in the Content Package

PosTable.detail: The fractional position offset from the start of the content package to the synchronized sample in the Content Package

PartitionArray.key: 80 62 c1 08 a8 0d eb fe 3a 9d c8 e1 7e 83 b6 4b

BodySID.detail: Stream ID of the Body in this partition

ByteOffset.detail: Byte offset from file start (1st byte of the file which is numbered 0) to the 1st byte of the Partition Pack Key

Length.detail: Overall Length of this Pack including the Set Key and BER Length fields

LastModifiedDate.detail: Date & time of the last modification of the file

ObjectModelVersion.detail: Simple integer version number of Object Model

PrimaryPackage.detail: The primary Package in this file

Identifications.detail: Ordered array of strong references to Identification sets recording all modifications to the file

ContentStorage.detail: Strong reference to Content Storage object

OperationalPattern.detail: Universal Label of the Operational Pattern which this file complies to (repeat of Partition Pack value)

EssenceContainers.detail: Unordered batch of ULs of Essence Containers used in or referenced by this file (repeat of Partition Pack value)

DMSchemes.detail: An unordered batch of Universal Labels of all the Descriptive Metadata schemes used in this file

DMScheme.detail: Universal Labels of Descriptive Metadata Scheme

CompanyName.detail: Manufacturer of the equipment or application that created or modified the file

ProductName.detail: Name of the application which created or modified this file

ProductVersion.detail: Maj.min.tweak.build.rel version number of this application

VersionString.detail: Human readable name of the application version

ProductUID.detail: A unique identification for the product which created this file (defined by the manufacturer)

ModificationDate.detail: Time & date an application created or modified this file and created this Identification set

ToolkitVersion.detail: Maj.min.tweak.build.rel version of software or hardware codec used

Platform.detail: Human readable name of the operating system used.

Packages.detail: Unordered batch of all packages used in this file

EssenceContainerData.detail: Unordered batch of strong references to Essence Container Data sets used in this file

ContentStorageKludge.detail: Kludge for Version 10 Content Storage set

V10Packages.detail: Unordered batch of all packages used in this file

LinkedPackageUID.detail: Identifier of the Package to which this set is linked as a UMID

IndexSID.detail: ID of the Index Table for the Essence Container to which this set is linked

BodySID.detail: ID of the Essence Container to which this set is linked

PackageUID.detail: Unique Package Identifier as a UMID

PackageCreationDate.detail: The date & time of creation of this package

PackageModifiedDate.detail: The date & time of last modification of this package

Tracks.detail: Array of Unique IDs of Tracks

NetworkLocator.detail: Network Locator set for location with a URL

URLString.detail: A URL indicating where the essence may be found.

TextLocator.detail: Text Locator set for location with a human-readable text string

LocatorName.detail: Value of a human-readable locator text string for manual location of essence

TrackID.detail: ID of the track in this package (for linking to a SourceTrackID in a segment)

TrackNumber.detail: Number used to link to the track in the Essence Container if it exists

TrackName.detail: Human readable name of the track type

Origin.detail: An Offset used to resolved timeline references to this track. The start of the track has this timeline value measured in Edit Units.

EventOrigin.detail: An Offset used to resolved timeline references to this event track. The start of the event track has this timeline value measured in Edit Units.

DataDefinition.detail: Data Definition - kind of data or metadata this structure refers to

StructuralComponents.detail: Ordered array of strong references to Structural Components

StartPosition.detail: Offset into Essence measured in edit units of the track containing this segment

SourcePackageID.detail: ID of referenced Package as a UMID

SourceTrackID.detail: Track ID of the referenced Track within the referenced Package

EventStartPosition.detail: Offset into the descriptive metadata track in edit units

EventComment.detail: Description of the Descriptive Metadata Framework

TrackIDs.detail: An unordered list of track ID values that identify the tracks in this Package to which this DM Framework refers (if omitted, refers to all essence tracks)

DMFramework.detail: Strong Reference to the Descriptive Metadata Framework

DMSourceClipTrackIDs.detail: An unordered list of track ID values that identify the tracks in this Package to which the referenced Descriptive Metadata refers (if omitted, refers to all essence tracks)

Locators.detail: Ordered array of strong references to Locator sets

SubDescriptor.detail: Strong reference to a sub descriptor set

SubDescriptors.detail: Ordered array of strong references to sub descriptor sets

SubDescriptor.detail: Strong reference to a sub descriptor set

LinkedTrackID.detail: Link to (i.e. value of) the Track ID of the Track in this Package to which the Descriptor applies

SampleRate.detail: The field or frame rate of the Essence Container (not the essence sampling clock rate)

ContainerDuration.detail: Duration of Essence Container (measured in Edit Units)

ContainerFormat.detail: The UL identifying the Essence Container Format described by this Descriptor

Codec.detail: UL to identify a codec compatible with this Essence Container

GenericPictureEssenceDescriptor.detail: Defines the Picture Essence Descriptor set

StoredHeight.detail: Vertical Field Size of active picture

SampledXOffset.detail: Offset from sampled to stored width

DisplayHeight.detail: Displayed Height placed in Production Aperture

DisplayWidth.detail: Displayed Width placed in Production Aperture

DisplayXOffset.detail: The horizontal offset from the (in pixels) of the picture as displayed

DisplayYOffset.detail: The vertical offset (in pixels) of the picture as displayed

AspectRatio.detail: Specifies the horizontal to vertical aspect ratio of the whole image as it is to be presented to avoid geometric distortion (and hence including any black edges)

ActiveFormatDescriptor.detail: Specifies the intended framing of the content within the displayed image

VideoLineMap.detail: First active line in each field

ImageAlignmentFactor.detail: Byte Boundary alignment required for Low Level Essence Storage

ImageStartOffset.detail: Unused bytes before start of stored data

ImageEndOffset.detail: Unused bytes before start of stored data

FieldDominance.detail: The number of the field which is considered temporally to come first

AlternativeCenterCuts.detail: Specifies the alternate aspect ratio subset(s) of the active area, containing all of the critical action and centered on the active area.

ActiveXOffset.detail: Specifies the horizontal offset of the Active Area Rectangle from the left side of the Display Rectangle.

ActiveYOffset.detail: Specifies the vertical offset of the Active Area Rectangle from the upper side of the Display Rectangle.

ActiveHeight.detail: Specifies the height of the Active Area Rectangle.

ActiveWidth.detail: Specifies the width of the Active Area Rectangle.

PictureEssenceCoding.detail: UL identifying the Picture Compression Scheme

CDCIEssenceDescriptor.detail: Defines the CDCI Picture Essence Descriptor set

ComponentDepth.detail: Number of active bits per sample (e.g. 8, 10, 16)

ColorSiting.detail: Enumerated value describing the color siting

ReversedByteOrder.detail: a FALSE value denotes Chroma followed by Luma pexels according to ITU Rec. 601

PaddingBits.detail: Bits to round up each pixel to stored size

AlphaSampleDepth.detail: Number of bits per alpha sample

BlackRefLevel.detail: Black refernece level e.g. 16 or 64 (8 or 10-bits)

WhiteReflevel.detail: White reference level e.g. 235 or 943 (8 or 10 bits)

ColorRange.detail: Color range e.g. 225 or 897 (8 or 10 bits)

RGBAEssenceDescriptor.detail: Defines the RGBA Picture Essence Descriptor set

ComponentMaxRef.detail: Maximum value for RGB components, e.g. 235 or 940 (8 or 10 bits)

ComponentMinRef.detail: Minimum value for RGB components, e.g. 16 or 64 (8 or 10 bits)

AlphaMaxRef.detail: Maximum value for alpha component, e.g. 235 or 940 (8 or 10 bits)

AlphaMinRef.detail: Minimum value for alpha component, e.g. 16 or 64 (8 or 10 bits)

GenericSoundEssenceDescriptor.detail: Defines the Sound Essence Descriptor set

AudioSamplingRate.detail: Sampling rate of the audio essence

Locked.detail: Boolean indicating that the Number of samples per frame is locked or unlocked (non-0 = locked)

AudioRefLevel.detail: Audio reference level which gives the number of dBm for 0VU

ElectroSpatialFormulation.detail: E.g. mono, dual mono, stereo, A,B etc (enum)

DialNorm.detail: Gain to be applied to normalise perceived loudness of the clip, defined by ATSC A/53 (1dB per step)

SoundCompression.detail: UL identifying the Sound Compression Scheme

ReferenceImageEditRate.detail: Edit rate of the image essence with which the audio is intended to sync. For example, 24/1.001 fps, 24 fps, 25 fps

ReferenceAudioAlignementLevel.detail: Reference alignment level of the audio expressed in dBFS. For example, -20dBFS.

GenericDataEssenceDescriptor.detail: Defines the Data Essence Descriptor set

DataEssenceCoding.detail: Specifies the data essence coding type

VBIDataDescriptor.detail: Defines the VBI Data Descriptor Set

SubDescriptorUIDs.detail: Unordered array of strong references to File Descriptor sets (1 per interleaved item within the Essence Container)

MPEG2VideoDescriptor.detail: Defines the MPEG2 Picture Essence Descriptor set

SingleSequence.detail: TRUE if the essence consists of a single MPEG sequence. False if there are a number of sequences. This flag implies that the sequence header information is not varying in the essence stream.

ConstantBFrames.detail: TRUE if the number of B frames is always constant

CodedContentType.detail: 0= "Unknown",1= "Progressive", 2= "Interlaced", 3= "Mixed": an enumerated value which tells if the underlying content which was MPEG coded was of a known type

LowDelay.detail: TRUE if low delay mode was used in the sequence

ClosedGOP.detail: TRUE if closed_gop is set in all GOP Headers, per 13818-1 IBP descriptor

IdenticalGOP.detail: TRUE if every GOP in the sequence is constructed the same, per 13818-1 IBP descriptor

MaxGOP.detail: Specifies the maximum occurring spacing between I frames, per 13818-1 IBP descriptor. A value of 0 or the absence of this property implies no limit to the maximum GOP

BPictureCount.detail: Specifies the maximum number of B pictures between P or I frames, equivalent to 13818-2 annex D (M-1)

BitRate.detail: Maximum bit rate of MPEG video elementary stream in bit/s as defined in ISO-13818-2 bit_rate property

ProfileAndLevel.detail: Specifies the MPEG-2 video profile and level. The value is taken directly from the profile_and_level_indication in the MPEG-2 sequence header extension. For main profile @ main level, the value is 0x48. For 4:2:2 profile @ main level, the value is 0x85

WaveAudioDescriptor.detail: Defines the Wave Audio Essence Descriptor Set

SequenceOffset.detail: Zero-based ordinal frame number of first essence data within five-frame sequence

ChannelAssignment.detail: UL enumerating the channel assignment in use

PeakEnvelopeFormat.detail: Format of a peak point (BWF dwFormat)

PointsPerPeakValue.detail: Number of peak points per peak value (BWF dwPointsPerValue)

PeakEnvelopeBlockSize.detail: Number of audio samples used to generate each peak frame (BWF dwBlockSize)

PeakOfPeaksPosition.detail: Offset to the first audio sample whose absolute value is the maximum value of the entire audio file (BWF dwPosPeakOfPeaks, extended to 64 bits)

PeakEnvelopeTimestamp.detail: Time stamp of the creation of the peak data (BWF strTimeStamp converted to TimeStamp)

Emphasis.detail: AES3 Emphasis (aligned to LSB of this property)

BlockStartOffset.detail: AES3 Position of first Z preamble in essence stream

ChannelStatusMode.detail: AES3 Enumerated mode of carriage of channel status data

FixedChannelStatusData.detail: AES3 Fixed data pattern for channel status data

UserDataMode.detail: AES3 Enumerated mode of carriage of user data, defined by AES3 section 4.

FixedUserData.detail: AES3 Fixed data pattern for user data

DM_Framework.detail: Superclass for all concrete DM Frameworks

DM_Set.detail: Superclass for all concrete DM Frameworks

DCDataDescriptor.detail: Defines D-Cinema Data Essence Descriptor set (e.g. used for Dolby Atmos)

DataEssenceCoding.detail: Specifies the data essence coding type

RFC5646LanguageTagList.detail: Identifies one or more languages as a comma-separated list of RFC 5646 language tags.

CodeblockStyle.detail: JPEG 2000 style of code-block coding passes

XRsiz.detail: Horizontal separation of a sample of this component with respect to the reference grid

YRsiz.detail: Vertical separation of a sample of this component with respect to the reference grid

DecompositionLevels.detail: Number of decomposition levels. Zero implies no transformation

CodeblockStyle.detail: Style of the code-block coding passes

SPqcd.detail: Quantization step size value for the each subband

Rsiz.detail: An enumerated value that defines the decoder capabilities

XOsiz.detail: Horizontal offset from the origin of the reference grid to the left side of the image area

YOsiz.detail: Vertical offset from the origin of the reference grid to the top side of the image area

XTsiz.detail: Width of one reference tile with respect to the reference grid

YTsiz.detail: Height of one reference tile with respect to the reference grid

XTOsiz.detail: Horizontal offset from the origin of the reference grid to the left side of the first tile

YTOsiz.detail: Vertical offset from the origin of the reference grid to the top side of the first tile

Csiz.detail: The number of components in the picture

CodingStyleDefault.detail: Default coding style for all components. Use this value only if static for all pictures in the Essence Container

QuantizationDefault.detail: Default quantization style for all components. Use this value only if static for all pictures in the Essence Container

J2CLayout.detail: The nature and order of the image components in the compressed domain as carried in the J2C codestream

GroupOfSoundfieldGroupsLinkID.detail: Group Of Soundfield Groups Link ID

GroupOfSoundfieldGroupsLabelSubDescripto.detail: Group Of Soundfield Groups Label Sub Descriptor

XMLDocumentTextIndirect.detail: An XML document as a text string

XMLDocumentText_RFC2152.detail: An XML document in UTF-7 text encoding form

MXFGCVBI.detail: MXF-GC Generic VBI Data Mapping Undefined Payload

SMPTE12MTimecodeTrackActiveUserBits.detail: SMPTE 12M Timecode Track with active user bits

DCAudioChannel_Ls.detail: SMPTE ST428-12 Audio Channel Left Surround

DCAudioChannel_Rs.detail: SMPTE ST428-12 Audio Channel Right Surround

DCAudioChannel_Lss.detail: SMPTE ST428-12 Audio Channel Left Side Surround

DCAudioChannel_Rss.detail: SMPTE ST428-12 Audio Channel Right Side Surround

DCAudioChannel_VIN.detail: SMPTE ST428-12 Audio Channel Visually Impaired-Narrative

IMFAudioChannel_M2.detail: SMPTE ST2067-8 Audio Channel Mono Two

IMFAudioChannel_Rst.detail: SMPTE ST2067-8 Audio Channel Right Surround Total

IMFAudioSoundfield_ST.detail: SMPTE ST2067-8 Soundfield Group Standard Stereo

IMFAudioSoundfield_DM.detail: SMPTE ST2067-8 Soundfield Group Dual Mono
